title: Error budget policy DSL
description: Add error_budget_policy section to service.yaml defining behavior when budget is exhausted. Schema: window (30d default), thresholds.warning (25%), thresholds.critical (10%), on_exhausted.freeze_deploys, on_exhausted.require_approval, on_exhausted.notify (channels/emails). Integrates with check-deploy command. Based on Google SRE error budget practices.
